title: Hanasaku Kizuna no Romantan
synopsis: After an invasion by the Vivolian army, the Sprite Himawari and her childhood friend Tsubaki flee their homeland of Floria for the town of Romton. There, they live out their lives in peace... for a time. One day, Himawari's friend and fellow Sprite Ajisai is kidnapped by mysterious strangers. Now Himawari and detective Tsubaki set out to rescue her, but find the dreaded Vivolians standing in their way! It is animated in 2D. The anime is promoting a special event in the Monster Strike mobile game where these new characters are obtainable through gacha and evolutions. (Source: Official YouTube channel) NOTE FOR MODS: japanese upload here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=61KEnMlMfXk and according to this Famitsu article I believe more eps are planned https://app.famitsu.com/20180829_1343977/ outside of the current one out already even though there is no number naming scheme in the title.
